name: Fluently Accent Guru
tagline: What accent do you have in English? I will tell in 30s
description: Are you a non-native English speaker? Check out our free English accent test. Fluently Accent Guru listens to your voice and guesses your accent in just 30 seconds. It‚Äôs fast, free, and surprisingly accurate. Try it to improve your English speaking skills!

name: HushLink
tagline: Sell any digital content with one simple link.
description: Stop building complex stores just to sell a file. HushLink lets you monetize any digital content in 60 seconds: Upload, price it, share the link. No monthly fees. No storefronts. No complexity. Just simple, secure payment links that work anywhere.

name: SimRepo
tagline: Shows similar Github repositories in the sidebar
description: Stop digging through GitHub. Instantly see similar repos

name: Addsubtitle
tagline: Let subtitles speak your global story.
description: Translate video and dub voices and auto add subtitles, directly in your browser. Available in 100+ languages with 99.9% accuracy. Make great content faster, try now for free!

name: Ostivities 2.0
tagline: The smarter way to run physical & virtual events
description: Ostivities helps organizers create, manage, and scale physical or virtual events now, with modules for speakers, vendors, breakout sessions, a revamped user interface, and recurring events. Simplify your next event from planning to experience, all in one place

name: TilePix
tagline: TileSet and TileMap Creation Suite
description: TilePix is your all-in-one mobile solution for creating pixel art, tilesets, and tilemaps. With a full suite of intuitive tools and smooth performance, it‚Äôs perfect for prototyping, designing game assets, or building multiple entire levels‚Äîfrom retro top-down adventures to side-scrolling platformers‚Äîright from your device at home or on the go!

name: Synara
tagline: The developer-first event & invite API that fixes ICS issues
description: Synara is a developer-first calendar invite and event-sync service that replaces messyics files with fast, reliable API-driven scheduling that's built for modern apps. ICS is 25+ years old and parsed differently across providers. Updates get ignored, duplicated, or partially applied. Synara uses ACE, a clean JSON event format, to normalise event data. A single API call handles invites, updates, sync, and ICS fallback, so your app gets predictable behaviour everywhere.

name: Superlines AI Search Auditor for ChatGPT
tagline: Audit any webpage for AI Search in ChatGPT
description: Superlines AI Search Site Auditor is the first free ChatGPT-native webpage auditor for AI Search.

name: RuleHook
tagline: Stop losing money on shipping. take back control.
description: RuleHook lets you create powerful, condition-based shipping logic for any store. Build ‚Äúif-this-then-that‚Äù rules to control rates, hide methods, set fees, rename options, restrict by postcode, distance, weight, cart value, product tags, and more. Works with WooCommerce, Shopify, and custom stores. No code, no hacks, full control.

name: Container Diet
tagline: Slim down your Docker images with AI-powered sass. üê≥üíÖ
description: Stop shipping bloated containers! Container Diet is a CLI tool that analyzes your Docker images and Dockerfiles to provide actionable, context-aware optimization advice. It uses AI to detect unnecessary packages, security risks, and bad practices‚Äîall while delivering feedback in a "sassy dietician" persona that makes optimization fun.

name: LexFlow
tagline: Create, understand, and sign contracts
description: LexFlow helps freelancers, founders, and small teams draft, understand, and sign contracts in minutes. AI explains every clause in plain-language, helping you send contracts that actually protect you.

name: Sabo
tagline: The trendiest Next.js 16 SaaS starter kits for your project.
description: Ship your SaaS in days with a production-ready boilerplate and beautiful UI. Everything founders spend weeks wiring up is already built in, integrated, and ready to customize. Auth, payments, DB, SEO, emails, analytics, testing, status page, deployment, and more. Tech stack includes Next.js, shadcn/ui, Magic UI, Supabase, Stripe, Resend, PostHog, Better Stack, Playwright, and more.

name: Million Dollar Headlines 3.0
tagline: Steal the hero sections of websites making $1,000,000+
description: This is a compilation of 100+ hero sections of small business websites that make over $1,000,000 in revenue to inspire, repurpose, and learn from. With v3, you can now see the hidden patterns and psychological triggers behind the headlines that convert.

name: Niche design magazine
tagline: Exploring where design flourishes in an age of sameness
description: A magazine for designers and product makers seeking meaning beyond metrics, inviting you to rethink our culture through the ways we design.

name: FindMyInfluencer
tagline: Find 50 targeted B2B leads in one click.
description: FindMyInfluencer generates hyper-targeted B2B lead lists instantly. Enter a niche ‚Üí get 50 companies with founder names, emails, LinkedIn profiles, employee size, and funding stage. It replaces hours of manual research, scraping, and spreadsheet work with a single click. Perfect for founders, agencies, sales teams, and marketers who want fast, clean, ready-to-use leads.

name: Crazy Wash
tagline: Laundry room simulator game on Telegram
description: The game is a laundry simulator where players accept laundry orders, fulfill them, and purchase consumables and upgrades. Achievements and rankings are also available.

name: Wedoflow Templates
tagline: 200+ Premium webflow template designs
description: Never start from scratch. 216+ Premium Webflow Templates in one place, for one price that feels unreal but it actually is.

name: Fragmento
tagline: Sync design tokens to shadcn with version control
description: Fragmento is a design token management platform that bridges the gap between design (Figma) and development (GitHub). It enables teams to maintain a single source of truth for design tokens with version control and shadcn-ready CSS variable exports.

name: Wallper
tagline: Live Wallpapers for Mac Desktop & Lock Screen
description: Wallper brings native live video wallpapers to your macOS desktop and Lock Screen. This version makes them feel lighter and smoother, with optimized playback and more reliable multi-display support. Browse a growing library of curated scenes or drop in your own videos, set everything in a click, and try it free to see if you can go back to a static wallpaper.

name: hasl.ink
tagline: Link page. yours. better.
description: One link for everything. AI that answers like you. Analytics that matter. Create your link page in 2 minutes.
